Keywords: Soldier , Winter Guard
Real Name: Nikolai Krylenko
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: SOLDIER THEMED TEAM: If Red Guardian is part of the listed themed team, he has: "At the beginning of your turn, you may choose Empower or Enhancement. Friendly characters with the Winter Guard keyword can use the chosen power until you choose again."
Special Powers
ENERGY REPELLENCE: Energy Shield/Deflection, Invulnerability. // Once per game when Red Guardian or an adjacent friendly character would be hit, they may evade the attack instead.

Comments
November 30, 2022
Bat-Phreak
Of the 7 characters (including Legacy characters) with Winter Guard KW, only 5 also have the Soldier KW. As none of the 7 are generic, without duplicating non-generic characters you max out at 295-pts with a 5-figure Winter Guard / Soldier Themed Team. Looks to be a pretty solid team, though, and it will definitely see some board time once I locate a Winter Guard / Red Guardian T-Shirt; my quirk: my T's must match my Themed Team. ;-D
November 8, 2022
Novashotgunner
It feels great getting a comic Red Guardian after so long. His get out of jail free card defense power can be huge in getting some early game tempo or saving it for later. The team up is simple and effective if you don't want to run Winter Guard then you may just add some value to his own dial for the rest of your soldiers.
